name: Grasps of Essence
flavorText: You feel attuned to the life force in all beings.
flavorTextHtml: You feel attuned to the life force in all beings.

primary.textHtml: Critical Hit Chance Increased by [8.0 - 10.0]%

secondary.textHtml: When an exploded corpse damages at least one enemy, your Corpse Explosion deals 157% increased damage for 6 seconds, stacking up to 5 times. (Necromancer Only) [150 - 200]%
